title: Effect of Nazi aggression on historical analysis

content.question: Which of the following best explains why, in the 1956 edition of the book, the author stated, “I no longer think that all wars are unnecessary”?

choices.label: The Second World War opened up new economic and social opportunities for women.
The Second World War led more writers to question literary conventions and bourgeois social values.
The Second World War opened up Europe to increased American cultural and economic influence.
The Second World War had to be fought to stop the expansion of Nazi Germany in Europe.

content.answer: The Second World War had to be fought to stop the expansion of Nazi Germany in Europe.
